name: Bull in a China Shop (Snail Rhymer)
name_original: Bull in a China Shop (Snail Rhymer)
description:
Play as a somewhat formless bull, trying to get to the checkout of a china shop before closing.

Controls:

- A/D to turn, but make sure not to bump your head.

- Space to restart (on a new level)

- Left quote (usually above tab) to hide the debugging text I accidentally left on.

---

If you want to mute the 17 seconds of music at the start, press Shift. There are a lot of physics objects, so it may be unhappy running in a browser. If you want to try a downloadable version, they are available here, but if voting for the game jam, please only take the web build into account.

A submission for the 2020 GMTK game jam, with the theme "Out of Control." Using thud and broken glass sounds from freesound, all other assets made by me.
